General.Name: Wuliangye Yibin Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuliangye Yibin Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells liquor and wine products under the Wuliangye brand in China. The company's products include Baijiu series, such as Wuliang Chun (Spring), Wuliang Chun (Rich Flavor), Wuliang Tequ, and Jianzhuang; and base fruit liquor. It is also involved in plastic product, printing, glass bottle, and other businesses. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yibin, China.
General.Address: No. 150, Minjiang West Road, Yibin, China, 644007
